author: James Arthur
lyrics:
I remember years ago someone told me I should take caution when it comes to love.
I did, and you were strong and I was not, my heart was broken, but I learned from the pain.
You were my weakness, but I couldn't let go, I fought for you even when we both knew it was over.
Impossible, it's all impossible, but I will never forget what we had, even though it couldn't last.
Every night I see your face in my dreams, your voice still echoes, tearing at the seams.
I tried to move on, but my heart won't let go, every step I take, I feel you in my soul.
Love was a battle, and we both lost the war, but I'd fight it again, just to feel you once more.
Impossible, yet I still hold on, to the memories of you, though you're long gone.
name: Impossible

author: Adele
lyrics:
I heard that you're settled down, that you found a girl and you're married now.
I heard that your dreams came true, guess she gave you things I didn't give to you.
Old friend, why are you so shy? Ain't like you to hold back or hide from the light.
I hate to turn up out of the blue uninvited, but I couldn't stay away, I couldn't fight it.
I'd hoped you'd see my face and that you'd be reminded that for me, it isn't over.
Never mind, I'll find someone like you, I wish nothing but the best for you, too.
Don't forget me, I beg, I remember you said, 'Sometimes it lasts in love, but sometimes it hurts instead.'
You know how the time flies, only yesterday was the time of our lives.
We were born and raised in a summer haze, bound by the surprise of our glory days.
name: Someone Like You

author: Tame Impala
lyrics:
Let it happen, let it happen, it's gonna feel so good, just let it happen, let it happen.
I heard about a whirlwind that's coming 'round, it's gonna carry everything out of the ground.
I can feel it coming, I can feel the change, something in the air, it's rearranging.
All this running around, trying to cover my shadow, a notion growing inside, now I'm letting it flow.
I'm ready to let go, I'm ready to evolve, into something new, I'm ready to resolve.
The past is fading, I'm breaking through the wall, the future's calling, I'm answering the call.
Let it happen, let the colors collide, I'm moving forward, with the universe as my guide.
No more holding back, no more fear inside, I'm letting it happen, I'm along for the ride.
name: Let It Happen
